message_1: What is the product formed when propene undergoes electrophilic addition reaction with hydrogen bromide (HBr)?
message_2:
When propene (C3H6) undergoes electrophilic addition reaction with hydrogen bromide (HBr), the product formed is 2-bromopropane (C3H7Br). The reaction proceeds as follows:

C3H6 + HBr â†’ C3H7Br
